body:
Comment 52: 
On Linux this time, a segfault. Hopefully Dmitry is on the trail of the problem, but
I'll keep posting traces until we're sure we have it fixed.

# uname -a
Linux system.cropdochq.lan 2.6.32-279.22.1.v6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Feb 6 09:13:41 MST 2013
x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
Attachments: 1. segfault on Linux Apr 6 1750.txt (636781 bytes)
